title: PrincessLotusStudio NEW UPDATE NEWS!

text_content.excerpt:
This message is for every fans of Canterlot Royal Ballet Academy series and every other followers of works of PrincessLotus Studio. Good morning, everyone , this is Sean.M speaking.new year comes, after one school period over, i would like to refresh my works, my artwork, music works, and other else, there are some huge progress i want to do for these days, including: - Creating PrincessLotusStudio's offical website and connect to other account like Facebook, DeviantArt and Youtube
- Creating a website club "A Golden Afternoon" , to gather every fairy tale's type theme's art, restore it, and training member's skill
- Preparing showcase of ...
